snippet.title: SpaceCraft | REVEAL TRAILER
snippet.description:
The Universe is yours. 

Explore a new galaxy in SpaceCraft, an online space exploration experience brought to you by Shiro Games, creators of Northgard, Wartales, and Dune: Spice Wars. 

Design and engineer your own spacecraft, extract and exploit resources, automate bases and interplanetary logistics. Together, with friends.

Coming 2025.

Wishlist now on Steam - https://shiro.li/aWv0pf

https://x.com/SpaceCraft_Game
https://discord.com/invite/7UPwxTGTr6
https://www.instagram.com/spacecraft_game/
https://www.facebook.com/people/Space-Craft-Game/61567336205266/
